trans-unit.source: Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is installed and started, consider the following setup options.
trans-unit.target: When [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is installed and started, consider the following setup options.

trans-unit.source: You can perform these tasks at any time.
trans-unit.target: You can perform these tasks at any time.

trans-unit.source: Install help files.
trans-unit.target: Install help files.

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that are included in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] do not come with help files.
trans-unit.target: The cmdlets that are included in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] do not come with help files.

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the [Update-Help](assetId:///93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet to download and install the newest help files on your computer.
trans-unit.target: However, you can use the [Update-Help](assetId:///93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet to download and install the newest help files on your computer.

trans-unit.source: When the files are installed, you can use the [Get-Help](assetId:///1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet to display them right at the command line.
trans-unit.target: When the files are installed, you can use the [Get-Help](assetId:///1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet to display them right at the command line.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Updatable_Help](assetId:///10bba75c-f4ac-4ca1-bbf3-8f34dd521ffe).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [about_Updatable_Help](assetId:///10bba75c-f4ac-4ca1-bbf3-8f34dd521ffe).

trans-unit.source: If you decide not to install the help files, you can still read the help topics online.
trans-unit.target: If you decide not to install the help files, you can still read the help topics online.

trans-unit.source: To find the online version of any cmdlet help topic, type: `Get-Help <CmdletName> -Online`.
trans-unit.target: To find the online version of any cmdlet help topic, type: `Get-Help <CmdletName> -Online`.

trans-unit.source: To browse the [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] help topics in the TechNet Library, start at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116).
trans-unit.target: To browse the [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] help topics in the TechNet Library, start at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116).

trans-unit.source: Run scripts.
trans-unit.target: Run scripts.

trans-unit.source: To keep [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] secure, the default execution policy on [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] is **Restricted**.
trans-unit.target: To keep [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] secure, the default execution policy on [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] is **Restricted**.

trans-unit.source: This policy allows you to run cmdlets, but not scripts.
trans-unit.target: This policy allows you to run cmdlets, but not scripts.

trans-unit.source: To run scripts, use the [Set-ExecutionPolicy[PSITPro5_Security]](assetId:///5690a0e1-495b-4e63-8280-65ead7bf01ab) cmdlet to change the execution policy to **AllSigned** or **RemoteSigned**.
trans-unit.target: To run scripts, use the [Set-ExecutionPolicy[PSITPro5_Security]](assetId:///5690a0e1-495b-4e63-8280-65ead7bf01ab) cmdlet to change the execution policy to **AllSigned** or **RemoteSigned**.

trans-unit.source: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can run this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can run this cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Execution_Policies [v4]](assetId:///347708dc-1515-4d74-978b-8334603472e6).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [about_Execution_Policies [v4]](assetId:///347708dc-1515-4d74-978b-8334603472e6).

trans-unit.source: Enable remoting.
trans-unit.target: Enable remoting.

trans-unit.source: The system is already configured for you to run remote commands on other computers.
trans-unit.target: The system is already configured for you to run remote commands on other computers.

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], the system is also configured to receive remote commands, that is, to allow other computers to run remote commands on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], the system is also configured to receive remote commands, that is, to allow other computers to run remote commands on the local computer.

trans-unit.source: To enable computers running other versions of Windows to receive remote commands, run the [Enable-PSRemoting](assetId:///19437c28-33b8-4ac1-9113-8439cc8beffb) cmdlet on the computer that you want to manage remotely.
trans-unit.target: To enable computers running other versions of Windows to receive remote commands, run the [Enable-PSRemoting](assetId:///19437c28-33b8-4ac1-9113-8439cc8beffb) cmdlet on the computer that you want to manage remotely.

trans-unit.source: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can run this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can run this cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Remote](assetId:///9b4a5c87-9162-4adf-bdfe-fbc80b9b8970).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [about_Remote](assetId:///9b4a5c87-9162-4adf-bdfe-fbc80b9b8970).

trans-unit.source: NOTE: If remoting is enabled on a computer that is running [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], remoting is still enabled after you install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: NOTE: If remoting is enabled on a computer that is running [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], remoting is still enabled after you install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, on [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] (not [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)]), you must re\-enable remoting after installing [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: However, on [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] (not [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)]), you must re\-enable remoting after installing [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell
